messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Karl Bunday site
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/13/03 9:46:46 PM, rosebl@adelphia.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/13/03 9:46:46 PM, rosebl@... writes:

<< I checked out the Karl Bundy site last night. It is very helpful,
especially the bibliographies and some of the articles. I'm listing it
again so that some of the new people can check it out too. But I don't
think he's an unschooler.
>>

He's not. I thought you were looking for information on getting into
colleges. That's why I recommended Cafi Cohen and Karl Bunday, who have
specific interests in that.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: Karl Bunday site
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I checked out the Karl Bundy site last night.  It is very helpful, especially the bibliographies and some of the articles.  I m listing it again so
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,

I checked out the Karl Bundy site last night. It is very helpful,
especially the bibliographies and some of the articles. I'm listing it
again so that some of the new people can check it out too. But I don't
think he's an unschooler.

http://learninfreedom.org/

Thanks.

Brenda Rose
